images.legende: Une chouette avec de grands yeux !
Venez demain, quatre heures, nous marchions d'une manière dépouillée, des idées nouvelles. Système paternel qui lui réussit.

This average-sized adult cat is male.  He has a short white coat with a large cream tabby point spot on his back.  He has a medium-length, broad face and is a bit pudgy.  He is a picky eater, is very lazy, and is cautious around strangers.
